DOC.brief_summary: The AS RCT study randomize control trial 16-weeks aerobic exercise ( home-based walking ) vs. usual care among 150 men prostate cancer active surveillance .
DOC.detailed_description: This PI initiate , randomize clinical trial exercise vs. usual care among men opt active surveillance prostate cancer . The AS RCT study randomize control trial 16-weeks aerobic exercise ( e.g. , brisk walking ) vs. usual care among 150 men prostate cancer active surveillance . After obtain write informed consent , enrolled subject schedule baseline assessment . The men randomize Intervention Arm engage individually tailor aerobic exercise program ( home-based walking ) follow principle aerobic exercise training guideline adult recommend American College Sports Medicine ( ACSM ) . The men Control Arm ask continue typical exercise practice 16 week . Men arm ask complete questionnaire baseline week 16 , month 12 & 24 . Specimens biopsy review investigator ' collaborator , GenomeDx , RNA characterization assessment genomic risk score . There also non-randomized observational component study collect biospecimens , survey , data , administer one CPET . Individuals enrol group include meet eligibility criterion RCT , wish RCT , interested participate lifestyle research . This group also provide u large heterogeneous population follow long term examine association exercise , biomarkers , fitness metric , clinical psychosocial outcome .
DOC.criteria: Histologicallydocumented localized ( stage < T3 ) prostate adenocarcinoma ; Undergoing initiate active surveillance ; ≥10 core prostate biopsy complete prior randomization least 2mm tumor Gleason sum ≤6 pattern 4 , Gleason 3+4 < 34 % core ; AND residual tumor tissue biopsy obtainable donate research ; Diagnostic PSA ≤10 ng/ml ; Low Moderate fitness level baseline ( assessed via interview exercise Protocol Protocol staff CPET ) ; Medical clearance base medical chart review normal ECG ( administer train health professional ) undergo symptomlimited cardiopulmonary exercise test aerobic training intervention Able achieve complete acceptable cardiopulmonary exercise test define follow : achieve peak plateau oxygen consumption concurrent increase power output ; respiratory exchange ratio ≥ 1.1 volitional exhaustion rating perceive exertion > 19 Englishspeaking A priori , allow men concurrent benign prostatic hyperplasia ( prostate volume > 50g ) PSA 1015 ng/ml ; include men low volume Gleason 3+4 disease . Also priori , allow men < 10 core biopsy discretion urologist s/he classifies patient `` lowrisk '' good candidate active surveillance base favorable feature ( e.g. , tumor molecular test , prostate imaging , etc. ) . Sufficient tumor determine base review pathology note need , consultation study pathologist . Current criterion `` sufficient '' include : > =1mm tumor > =25 % available sample tumor . NonRandomized Observational Component Eligibility : Eligibility nonrandomized observational component : Histologicallydocumented localized ( stage < T3 ) prostate adenocarcinoma ; Undergoing initiate active surveillance ; Biopsy prior study enrollment obtainable AND sufficient residual tumor tissue biopsy obtainable donate research . Medical clearance base medical chart review normal ECG ( administer train health professional ) undergo symptomlimited cardiopulmonary exercise test aerobic training intervention Englishspeaking Any prior concurrent treatment prostate cancer ; Use finasteride dutasteride within 3 week 6 month , respectively , study entry ; 57 Uncontrolled illness , physical disability , contraindication aerobic exercise training include , limited : Acute myocardial Infarction ( within 5 day plan study procedure ) ; Unstable angina ; Uncontrolled arrhythmia cause symptom hemodynamic compromise ; Recurrent syncope ; Active endocarditis ; Acute myocarditis pericarditis ; Symptomatic severe aortic stenosis ; Uncontrolled heart failure ; Acute ( within 3 month ) pulmonary embolus pulmonary infarction ; Thrombosis low extremity ; Suspected dissect aneurysm ; Uncontrolled asthma ; Pulmonary edema ; Room air desaturation rest ≤85 % ; Respiratory failure ; Acute noncardiopulmonary disorder may affect exercise performance aggravate exercise ( ie infection , renal failure , thyrotoxicosis ) ; Mental impairment lead inability cooperate .
